name: Valley (itch) (yxcolddew)
description:
Welcome to Valley, a peaceful corner away from the city!

You are sick of the noise of the bustling city. You find some information online about a small town in the suburb, and you decide to give it a visit. When you arrive,  a very strange creature greets you friendly and shows you to the house. After a night of rest in the town, you wake up on this beautiful morning and start to explore this new town.

Gameplay

WSAD to move forward, backward, leftward, and rightward accordingly.

Move the mouse to rotate the direction.

Button E to interact with objects.

left click of the mouse to move to the next line of dialogue.

Feature
  • Single-player supported.
  • The player’s goal is to explore the details of the town.
  • The player interacts with different kinds of objects based on the instruction from the guide NPC

This is a student project for INFSCI1470 at the University of Pittsburgh
